lp_header1: The sustainable & healthy dispenser for innovative offices üá®üá≠
lp_text1: We help you replace the PET-bottles in your location and offer a variation of healthy beverages from one touchpoint.
lp_partners: Already creating more circular and healthy locations with us
lp_step2: Choose one of our natural aromas
lp_step4: Refill & enjoy your sustainable, functional drink - Cheers!
lp_text3: Revolutionize the beverage consumption in your office
lp_box1header: Ditch plastic bottles by simply refilling
lp_box1text: Our fountain enables you to choose an alternative to plastic bottles. You can conveniently fill up flavoured drinks in your reusable bottle or cup, cutting CO2-Emissions by more than 50%. Become a part of the sustainable future by going waste-free.
lp_box2header: Cut your cost by 50% on average
lp_box2text: Designed for low maintenance and automated reordering the fountain saves offices on average 50% of their beverage expenses and let‚Äôs you focus on what you are best at. Less packaging also means less expenses - so you only pay for what you really get.
lp_box3text: Tailor the drink to your specific needs by choosing the type of water, one of our natural flavours and add from up to 2 functional enhancement to get you ready for your tasks ahead. Ready to experience your full potential every single day?
lp_header4: Our journey to reduce 1 billion PET-bottles
lp_text4: The idea of founding a company together to fight the extensive use of single-use plastic came up at a family dinner. Luca told Alex about his recent pain point that every time he wants a flavoured drink while commuting, he relies on a single-use plastic bottle even though he has his reusable bottle with him. In the following month Alex recognized the extent of the problem at a Beach Clean-up in Ghana and once he returned, he was very excited to start project ‚Äúfountain‚Äù and tackle the plastic problem. Eager to make a change we started building our first prototypes and tested them with different organizations where it became evident that we are not the only ones ready for a change towards more circularity.
lp_testimonial_text1: The dispenser is awesome and reduces our plastic consumption by half. We love it
lp_testimonial_text2: The dispenser is awesome and reduces our plastic consumption by half. We love it
lp_testimonial_text3: The dispenser is awesome and reduces our plastic consumption by half. We love it
lp_blog_text1: With fountain. we reduce the amount of plastic waste and we do it with our unique network of zero-waste
lp_blog_text2: With fountain. we reduce the amount of plastic waste and we do it with our unique network of zero-waste
lp_blog_text3: With fountain. we reduce the amount of plastic waste and we do it with our unique network of zero-waste
product_text1: The fountain enables you to refill your personalised drink without depending on single-use packaging. Use existing glasses or your reusable bottle to hydrate and feel great.
product_techFeatures_text1: Having the option of 100+ combinations gives you the freedom to get exactly what your body needs to stay on top of the game.
product_techFeatures_text2: We not only enable you to ditch the plastic bottle but we also make use of local water to reduce transportation emissions. Make a measurable impact with every drink!
product_techFeatures_text3: We ensure efficient operation via our IoT-Platform. Timely alerts as well as step-by-step explanations for task, ensure that you can focus on what you‚Äôre best at.
product_techFeatures_text4: Our dispenser is assembled and designed in Switzerland ensuring that transportation ways are minimized and quality standards are fulfilled.
product_techFeatures_text5: Use our dispenser to get feedback from your employees, promote an upcoming event or keep them informed. You have the freedom to play our display as you wish.
product_techFeatures_text6: Install the fountain in your existing infrastructure or get it as a stand-alone version. The fountain is designed with you in mind.
product_installationReqs_text1: Water supply (‚Öú‚Äù outer diameter) Standard 220 V outlet Standard Swiss/European counter Centered cutout in counter, directly over the placement of chiller (template provided) Wifi (if possible) Waste water connection (optional).
product_installationReqs_text2: Table Top Version: W 200 mm x D 250mm x H 460 mm Stand-up Version: W 600 mm x D 500mm x H 1450 mm
product_WantToKnowMore: Want to know more about our offering?
drinks_text1: Refreshment with no second thoughts. Locally produced and with natural flavours. This makes our personalised drinks not only good for you but also for the planet.
drinks_text: Add your natural flavour to your choice of filtered water, sparkling water & even choose your temperature (cold, ambient, hot)
drinks_header3: Feel great & productive with our enhancements
drinks_block1_text: Elevate your energy and focus with our caffeine-enhanced product, designed to invigorate and empower you throughout your day.
drinks_block2_text: Revitalize and recover with our refreshing beverage, fortified with essential electrolytes to rejuvenate your body and maintain peak performance.
drinks_block3_text: Empower your immune system and protect your well-being with our product enriched with the immune-boosting benefits of vitamin C.
mission_text1: Let's path the way towards circularity together - a bottle at a time. We want to address the plastic pollution at the root & save up to 1 Bio. PET-bottles over the next 10 years.
mission_storyBold: Why shall I buy a single-use bottle every time I want a flavoured drink when I have a reusable bottle with me?
mission_story: That was the question, Luca asked himself when looking down on his reusable steel bottle and a freshly bought soft drink during his commute from Lucerne to Zurich. Soon enough at a family dinner Alex & Luca discussed the news and the seed was planted. Alex went to a trip to Ghana for a Beach Cleanup where he recognized the extent of the plastic problem. Once back in Switzerland, Alex & Luca sat together to discuss project ‚Äúfountain‚Äù and a few weeks later, the first prototype made out of cardboard was ready to test if there are other people that can relate with our mission. Since then we got a mission - reducing plastic waste & creating a real impact!
mission_text2: Why always get a single-use bottle, if we could use our reusable bottl instead. Let‚Äôs make a difference together! What we offer:
mission_box1_header: 1.6 billion - That's how many PET bottles are produced in Switzerland every year.
mission_box1_text: Reduce your ecological footprint by refilling instead of relying on single-use plastic bottles. With every drink you save a plastic bottle.
mission_box2_header: 1.6 billion - That's how many PET bottles are produced in Switzerland every year.
mission_box2_text: We did a first life cycle assessment of our first prototype which shows that consumption of beverages with reusable bottles can cut down CO2-emissions by 49% with our first prototype. Since we are now using natural aromas with higher mixing ratio this impact can even be enhanced. So let‚Äôs ditch the plastic bottles and reduce plastic waste as well as CO2-emissions.
mission_box3_header: 1.6 billion - That's how many PET bottles are produced in Switzerland every year.
mission_box3_text: You remember that reusable bottle that you always carry with you? Well, why not also just use it for flavoured drinks. It‚Äôs convenient and sustainable. We set ourselves the goal of reducing 1 Bio. PET-bottles over the next 10 years. Start refilling with us and let‚Äôs create a real impact together.

team_text1: Get to know the people behind fountain who want to revolutionize the beverage consumption towards more sustainability and less plastic waste.
team_text2: Eager to make a real impact together
team_member1_text: Alexander finished his academia with a MSc in B.A and in the meantime founded already 2 other startups. He also self-thought himself how to be a SW Developer.
team_member2_text: Luca finished his BSc in Mech. Engineering while representing Switzerland as a swimmer. Currently he is finishing his Masters degree at ZHAW with focus Energy & environment.
contact_text1: Learn more about our offerings and how we can help you turn your location into a sustainable & healthy space. Request a 30min online meeting so that we can provide you with the most current information or answer your general questions.
privacy_text1:
[Your Website Name] Privacy Policy

Last Updated: [Date]

Thank you for visiting [Your Website Name]. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website.

By accessing or using [Your Website Name], you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information

We may collect personally identifiable information, such as:

- Your name
- Contact information, including email address
- Demographic information, such as postcode, preferences, and interests
- Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers

1.2 Non-Personal Information

We may also collect non-personal information about your visit to our website, such as:

- The type of browser and operating system you use
- The date and time of your visit
- Pages viewed and time spent on our site

### 2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information for the following purposes:

- To personalize your experience on our website
- To improve our website based on your feedback
- To send periodic emails with promotional content, updates, and other information you may find relevant

### 3. Security

We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. We have implemented suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

### 4. Cookies

Our website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can choose to accept or decline cookies. If you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to fully experience all features of our website.

### 5. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over the content or privacy practices of these sites and are not responsible for the protection and privacy of any information you provide while visiting such sites.

### 6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

- Request access to the personal information we hold about you
- Correct any inaccuracies in your personal information
- Opt-out of receiving promotional communications

### 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Please review this page for the latest information.

### 8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your contact information].
terms_text1:
[Your Website Name] Terms and Conditions

Last Updated: [Date]

Welcome to [Your Website Name]. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using [Your Website Name], you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and any other policies or guidelines posted on the website.

2. User Eligibility

You must be at least [age] years old to use this website. By using the website, you represent and warrant that you meet this age requirement.

3. User Account

If you create an account on our website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for restricting access to your computer or device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

### 4. User Conduct

You agree not to:

- Violate any applicable laws or regulations
- Infringe upon the rights of others
- Use the website for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose
- Interfere with or disrupt the operation of the website

### 5. Intellectual Property

All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of [Your Company Name] and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or display any portion of the content without our prior written consent.

### 6. Limitation of Liability

[Your Company Name] is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of this website or with the delay or inability to use the website.

### 7. Termination

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to [Your Website Name] without prior notice for any violation of these terms or for any other reason.

### 8. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms and Conditions periodically. Please review this page for the latest information.

### 9. Governing Law

These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State].

### 10. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms and Conditions, please contact us at [your contact information].
